xwikidoc.content:
# Class BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference
# Creation templates BookVersions.template.newBook=Create a new book. BookVersions.template.description=Description BookVersions.template.title=Title
# Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.title=New page creation BookVersions.creationForm.changedName=The chosen name isn't compatible with the naming policy chosen by your Administrator. A valid variant is proposed below. Please validate if the proposition is fine. BookVersions.creationForm.noCollectionRef=The field [collectionRef] is missing in the URL. It is the reference of the collection (book/library) where to create the page. BookVersions.creationForm.noTemplate=The field [template] is missing in the URL. It is the template to use for creating the new page. BookVersions.creationForm.exists=The page [{0}] already exists, please select a new name. BookVersions.creationForm.noPermission=Your user has no permission to create [{0}]. BookVersions.creationForm.docName=Enter the new {0} ID (different from the name, set later): BookVersions.creationForm.submit=Create
# Page Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New book page BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create
# Navigation menu BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect=Version BookVersions.navMenu.versioned=Content from version [{0}]. BookVersions.navMenu.inherited=Content inherited from version [{0}].
